item.description: Our group hunted  at Fellsway East last year and had great luck. It's easy to find. It's exactly 1.5 miles past the entrance to the Stone Zoo going south. The parking lot is  just before  the John W. Flynn skating rink on the right. Look for the MLUSA sign. For those of you using a GPS, the physical address is 300 Elm St, Medford, Ma. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: 1.5 miles past the entrance to the Stone Zoo going south.
item.name: Mushroom Hunt at Fellsway East in Medford
